# texxd

A terminal hex editor built with Textual.

## Usage

```bash
uvx texxd file.bin
# or
pip install texxd
texxd file.bin
```

## 🔗 Links

* [🏠 home](https://bitplane.net/dev/python/texxd)
* [🐍 pypi](https://pypi.org/project/texxd)
* [🐱 github](https://github.com/bitplane/texxd)
